be5ac7bf-8505-4371-860f-9525e7a9aad7.name: Sympathy
be5ac7bf-8505-4371-860f-9525e7a9aad7.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP

316d7aa2-8444-4372-883d-88e378008bbe.name: Sympathy
316d7aa2-8444-4372-883d-88e378008bbe.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP and wounds affect ally but not you

10cfb2b2-4061-448c-9478-efdf16fdb63c.name: Sympathy
10cfb2b2-4061-448c-9478-efdf16fdb63c.notes: Death of one party kills the other

22594d88-aa6f-486e-8f92-a28aa6ceabfc.name: Sympathy
22594d88-aa6f-486e-8f92-a28aa6ceabfc.notes: Death of one party kills the other and wounds affect ally but not you

7a103d26-030e-420d-b545-835395de33fd.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

d02c829c-73e4-4fdb-b5a2-11d7496f08fb.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

6a90e650-34d9-4001-9a4e-145e0a5427eb.name: @Who: Individual with 150% of PC's starting points@

a34261fb-7c6a-4bfb-bcc9-94189bd60eb5.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 1000 times starting wealth@

18178218-1b28-47ae-b6e4-ac15c9682687.name: @Who: Individual with twice the PC's starting points@

5a5f9e39-fe55-442e-b820-88ea5cdf46f5.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 10000 times starting wealth@

2851e250-ae66-439b-8b12-0d3c6302902b.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 100000 times starting wealth@

3acfe7d4-d9b4-47b0-9b3f-93f1f1de11ae.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 1000000 times starting wealth@

9fac19e1-b7c6-4e1b-ad10-b6824b21eecf.name: @Who: A national government or giant multi-national organization@

cae5edc7-5b25-47fb-b3c4-46edc2e5e3a9.name: Equipment
cae5edc7-5b25-47fb-b3c4-46edc2e5e3a9.notes: @Equipment worth no more than average starting wealth@

77ab274f-5fe6-450e-9513-648192ea7629.name: Equipment
77ab274f-5fe6-450e-9513-648192ea7629.notes: @Equipment worth more than average starting wealth@

f821bb94-f652-4c16-bd37-aebab60e98a9.name: Special Abilities
f821bb94-f652-4c16-bd37-aebab60e98a9.notes: @Magical powers in a non-magical world, higher TL equipment, grants special powers or is supernatural@

32d86d23-e606-49b0-8c4f-539ec9e44d4c.name: Narrow Clearance on a "Need to Know" Basis

ef2d8bf8-8f55-451d-b0c6-fd4c5cbad380.name: Broad Clearance on a "Need to Know" Basis

features.situation: to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial
to all rolls to notice interruptions while obsessed with a task

863134fe-8bfa-40db-ab66-a6d7d92388ce.name: Alternate Benefit
863134fe-8bfa-40db-ab66-a6d7d92388ce.notes: Bonus to resist deception involving numbers

features.situation: from engineers and scientists

c765d882-50ae-4b4d-afa5-b460e565b9d5.name: Unfazeable
c765d882-50ae-4b4d-afa5-b460e565b9d5.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

f5a696ba-98a3-4a02-93aa-24d4425c2827.name: Acrophobia (Heights)
f5a696ba-98a3-4a02-93aa-24d4425c2827.notes: You may not voluntarily go more than 15 feet above ground, unless you are inside a building and away from windows. If there is some chance of an actual fall, self-control rolls are at -5.

8b65be55-4243-417a-8037-cb90eb2adfad.name: Agoraphobia (Open Spaces)
8b65be55-4243-417a-8037-cb90eb2adfad.notes: You are uncomfortable whenever you are outside, and actually become frightened when there are no walls within 50 feet.

c90e798e-2fb1-4712-9908-ff8d45023367.name: Aichmophobia/TL5- (Sharp Things)
c90e798e-2fb1-4712-9908-ff8d45023367.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

ce4e9a62-0f8f-45dd-8476-03cc1bb7f394.name: Aichmophobia/TL6+ (Sharp Things)
ce4e9a62-0f8f-45dd-8476-03cc1bb7f394.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

884d5a8f-ebde-403a-804a-b400a44468cf.name: Ailurophobia (Cats)
884d5a8f-ebde-403a-804a-b400a44468cf.notes: This includes all felines: lions, tigers, panthers, etc.

609a454d-972c-4853-8818-9cf62bc4774a.name: Autophobia (Being Alone)
609a454d-972c-4853-8818-9cf62bc4774a.notes: You cannot stand to be alone, and do anything in your power to avoid it.

b3909aac-2a9a-41b6-bf99-a16331176948.name: Brontophobia (Loud Noises)
b3909aac-2a9a-41b6-bf99-a16331176948.notes: You avoid any situation where loud noises are likely. A sudden loud noise requires an immediate self-control roll. A thunderstorm is a traumatic experience for you!

features.situation: from others
from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture
to others
to IQ-based skills when alone

52cc0902-5c20-44e9-9f09-cf1faf219db0.name: Claustrophobia (Enclosed Spaces)
52cc0902-5c20-44e9-9f09-cf1faf219db0.notes: You are uncomfortable any time you can’t see the sky – or at least a very high ceiling. In a small room or vehicle, you feel the walls closing in on you... You need air! This is a dangerous fear for someone who plans to go underground.

features.situation: from others
to resist Sex Appeal

911457ea-2bc3-41e1-b886-4654e3645801.name: Code of Honor (Professional)
911457ea-2bc3-41e1-b886-4654e3645801.notes: Adhere to the ethics of your profession; always do your job to the best of your ability; support your guild, union, or professional association.

af34d7c8-0650-43a7-94fc-eed57424668f.name: Coitophobia (Sex)
af34d7c8-0650-43a7-94fc-eed57424668f.notes: You are terrified by the idea of sexual relations or the loss of your virginity.

acefea62-7174-4148-9744-ef348ddbfee2.name: Combat Paralysis
acefea62-7174-4148-9744-ef348ddbfee2.notes: In any situation in which personal harm seems imminent, make a HT roll. Do not roll until the instant you need to fight, run, pull the trigger, or whatever. Any roll over 13 is a failure, even if you have HT 14+. On a success, you can act normally. On a failure, you are mentally stunned.

46f3b7ef-4360-4510-9e74-835cecade50f.name: Cowardice
46f3b7ef-4360-4510-9e74-835cecade50f.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to risk physical danger. Roll at -5 if you must risk death.

19b748a7-235a-4a45-b4de-de6fc6adb22d.name: Cynophobia (Dogs)
19b748a7-235a-4a45-b4de-de6fc6adb22d.notes: This includes all canines: foxes, wolves, coyotes, wild dogs, etc.

0a623a9a-440e-42d6-ac2f-33cb3cf84b1b.name: Demophobia (Crowds)
0a623a9a-440e-42d6-ac2f-33cb3cf84b1b.notes: Any group of over a dozen people sets off this fear unless they are all well known to you. The self-control roll is at -1 for over 25 people, -2 for a crowd of 100 or more, -3 for 1,000, -4 for 10,000, and so on.

6d0213bd-864a-4f8c-bdd4-5567d1105d22.name: Entomophobia (Insects)
6d0213bd-864a-4f8c-bdd4-5567d1105d22.notes: You are afraid of all “bugs.” Large or poisonous ones give -3 to self-control rolls. Very large ones, or large numbers, give -6. Avoid hills of giant ants.

84584df4-5923-4ead-bd8a-5c02881dc429.name: Gluttony
84584df4-5923-4ead-bd8a-5c02881dc429.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with a tempting morsel or good wine that, for some reason, you should resist. If you fail, you partake – regardless of the consequences.

d2eee859-ec0e-4808-bc4b-39bb95adf0f9.name: Hemophobia (Blood)
d2eee859-ec0e-4808-bc4b-39bb95adf0f9.notes: The sight of blood gives you the screaming willies! You need to make a self-control roll during most combats...

9ffd7944-988d-484c-962e-3f949f5ee40b.name: Herpetophobia (Reptiles)
9ffd7944-988d-484c-962e-3f949f5ee40b.notes: You come unglued at the thought of reptiles, amphibians, and similar scaly slimies. A very large reptile, or a poisonous one, gives -2 to self-control rolls; a horde of reptiles (such as a snake pit) gives -4.

features.situation: on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill, all Engineer rolls for new inventions, and all skill rolls made to use the Gadgeteer advantage

6869f2dd-3c4c-46e8-9fc6-b5d324cb9af8.name: Honesty
6869f2dd-3c4c-46e8-9fc6-b5d324cb9af8.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

f23b2d23-d450-42d4-8b41-4622b4e119c0.name: Hoplophobia (Weapons)
f23b2d23-d450-42d4-8b41-4622b4e119c0.notes: The presence of any sort of weaponry is stressful. Trying to use a weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

c2d641bf-9042-4a7a-b389-b2810a28794b.name: Incurious
c2d641bf-9042-4a7a-b389-b2810a28794b.notes: Make a self-control roll when confronted with something strange. If you fail, you ignore it!

features.situation: to new things
from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)

e753b726-acd9-4e9e-974c-83598659b6aa.name: Low Pain Threshold
e753b726-acd9-4e9e-974c-83598659b6aa.notes: Double the shock from any injury. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

features.situation: from "macho" individuals
to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture

e1300000-7269-4625-a966-7c97ba894696.name: Manaphobia (Magic)
e1300000-7269-4625-a966-7c97ba894696.notes: You can never learn to use magic, and you react badly to any user of magic. Make a self-control roll whenever you are in the presence of magic. This roll is at -3 if you are to be the target of friendly magic, and -6 if you are the target of hostile magic. (The magic does not have to be real, if you believe in it!)

b0629208-8460-43f4-aa28-72f7779c26df.name: Mild Shyness
b0629208-8460-43f4-aa28-72f7779c26df.notes: You are uneasy with strangers, especially assertive or attractive ones.

990ab050-ba55-4eb7-9117-9d724ea949d9.name: Miserliness
990ab050-ba55-4eb7-9117-9d724ea949d9.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to spend money. If the expenditure is large, this roll may be at -5 or worse (GM’s decision). If you fail, you refuse to spend the money.

db20228e-9cae-40ab-b89f-fa3f82f765e7.name: Mysophobia (Dirt)
db20228e-9cae-40ab-b89f-fa3f82f765e7.notes: You are deathly afraid of infection, or just of dirt and filth. Make a self-control roll when you must do something that might get you dirty. Roll at -5 to eat any unaccustomed food. You should act as “finicky” as possible.

1c5f1a94-b2f4-410f-bfbb-412401fb7224.name: Necrophobia (Death)
1c5f1a94-b2f4-410f-bfbb-412401fb7224.notes: You are terrified by the idea of death. Make a self-control roll in the presence of any dead body (animals don’t count, but portions of human bodies do). Roll at -4 if the body is that of someone you know, or -6 if the body is unnaturally animated in some way. A ghost (or apparent ghost) also requires a roll at -6.

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident
to resist Influence skills: Diplomacy, Fast-Talk, Intimidation, Savoir-Faire, Sex Appeal, and Streetwise

c2803392-1992-467d-96f6-da7f10f5a859.name: Pacifism: Cannot Harm Innocents
c2803392-1992-467d-96f6-da7f10f5a859.notes: You may fight – you may even start fights – but you may only use deadly force on a foe that is attempting to do you serious harm. Capture is not “serious harm” unless you are already under penalty of death or have a Code of Honor that would require suicide if captured. You never intentionally do anything that causes, or even threatens to cause, injury to the uninvolved – particularly if they are “ordinary folks.”

25404e5e-784f-4a0b-84e1-cebc056088c4.name: Pacifism: Cannot Kill
25404e5e-784f-4a0b-84e1-cebc056088c4.notes: You may fight – you may even start fights – but you may never do anything that seems likely to kill another. This includes abandoning a wounded foe to die “on his own”! You must do your best to keep your companions from killing, too. If you do kill someone (or feel responsible for a death), you immediately suffer a nervous breakdown. Roll 3d and be totally morose and useless for that many days. During this time, you must make a Will roll to offer any sort of violence toward anyone, for any reason.

53dd94e6-5f93-475b-8de7-1d176199c880.name: Pacifism: Reluctant Killer
53dd94e6-5f93-475b-8de7-1d176199c880.notes: You are psychologically unprepared to kill people. Whenever you make a deadly attack (e.g., with a knife or a gun) against an obvious person whose face is visible to you, you are at -4 to hit and may not Aim. If you cannot see the foe’s face (due to a mask, darkness, or distance, or because you attacked from behind), the penalty is only -2, save in close combat. You have no penalty to attack a vehicle (even an occupied one), an opponent you do not believe is a person (including things with Horrific or Monstrous appearance), or a target you can’t actually see (e.g., a set of map coordinates or a blip on a radar screen). If you kill a recognizable person, the effect on you is the same as for Pacifism: Cannot Kill. You have no problem with your allies killing; you may even supply ammo, loaded weapons, and encouragement! You just can’t do the killing yourself.

1916289a-6672-4788-91d7-f80980922c02.name: Pacifism: Self-Defense Only
1916289a-6672-4788-91d7-f80980922c02.notes: You only fight to defend yourself or those in your care, using only as much force as necessary (no pre-emptive strikes allowed!). You must do your best to discourage others from starting fights.

ae6f4586-006e-4a4e-90a0-89a0c96771bf.name: Post-Combat Shakes
ae6f4586-006e-4a4e-90a0-89a0c96771bf.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

e0d8f817-189e-4399-bbcc-5ee77ed5da94.name: Pyrophobia (Fire)
e0d8f817-189e-4399-bbcc-5ee77ed5da94.notes: Even a burning cigarette bothers you if it comes within five yards.

fd9b0311-4236-43a7-9ded-d282858c5bb7.name: People Affected
fd9b0311-4236-43a7-9ded-d282858c5bb7.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

f2a8cab0-b54b-4d56-8325-9076095fa81a.name: Scotophobia (Darkness)
f2a8cab0-b54b-4d56-8325-9076095fa81a.notes: A common fear, but crippling. You should avoid being underground if possible; if something happens to your flashlight or torch, you might well lose your mind before you can relight it.

9138fc5f-c2cd-45e5-bb3a-2a46cf20fa45.name: Selfish
9138fc5f-c2cd-45e5-bb3a-2a46cf20fa45.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

8e09dcf1-748a-4208-9b05-09ce1538caa8.name: Severe Shyness
8e09dcf1-748a-4208-9b05-09ce1538caa8.notes: You are very uncomfortable around strangers, and tend to be quiet even among friends.

features.situation: from others

21a8dfdb-bdae-4056-8f30-b706ec1e05ee.name: Teratophobia (Monsters)
21a8dfdb-bdae-4056-8f30-b706ec1e05ee.notes: Any “unnatural” creature sets off this fear. You have -1 to -4 on the self-control roll if the monster seems very large or dangerous, or if there are a lot of them. Note that the definition of “monster” depends on experience. An American Indian would consider an elephant monstrous, while an African pygmy would not!

5a636d91-7074-4a46-906c-76317ffba1d5.name: Thalassophobia (Oceans)
5a636d91-7074-4a46-906c-76317ffba1d5.notes: You are afraid of any large body of water. Ocean travel, or even air travel over the ocean, is basically impossible for you, and encounters with aquatic monsters are also upsetting.

55021704-c877-4aa3-b3b6-d20f8f55d31e.name: Triskaidekaphobia (Number 13)
55021704-c877-4aa3-b3b6-d20f8f55d31e.notes: You must make a self-control roll whenever you have to deal with the number 13. Roll at -5 if Friday the 13th is involved!

55cbb5b5-0ee0-4241-91ad-3721a5ede336.name: Unfit
55cbb5b5-0ee0-4241-91ad-3721a5ede336.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate

features.situation: to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc

086b6578-580e-44c0-b3bc-b041981dbc91.name: Unluckiness
086b6578-580e-44c0-b3bc-b041981dbc91.notes: Once per play session, the GM will arbitrarily and maliciously make something go wrong for you.

6ebe53e2-54e6-46f2-86d1-482a79c10520.name: Very Unfit
6ebe53e2-54e6-46f2-86d1-482a79c10520.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate and recover FP at only half the normal rate

features.situation: -2 to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc.

ad4aac0d-20fb-4a65-8f64-1874a579a4b8.name: Xenophobia (Strange and Unknown Things)
ad4aac0d-20fb-4a65-8f64-1874a579a4b8.notes: You are upset by any sort of strange circumstances, and in particular by strange people. Make a self-control roll when surrounded by people of another race or nationality; roll at -3 if the people are not human. If you lose control, you might well attack strangers out of fear.

64ff0260-45b3-44b5-bf67-836e49e74cd4.name: 2 extra points in Primary or Secondary skills
